alert.note: Alert for Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 11 at 4:01AM AKST until January 11 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following area, Southern Inner Channels. This includes the cities of Ketchikan And Metlakatla. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall rates have begun to slow down but snow continues to melt. Area creeks have started to level off, but remain elevated. With continued snowmelt and increased runoff, ponding of water and localized flooding remain possible.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
